title: Can't disenchant shards into essence
body: Ever since the new patch, I can't disenchant shards into essence. it shows the essence when I hover over the shard but when I click it nothing happens. No button to disenchant it nothing. It's pretty frustrating because I have over 10 shards blue and orange and no way to cash them out for champs or skins I want.

replies.body: You may have just needed to refresh your client or reset your network for a better connection. Any ideas what fixed it?
